【考法 1】 adj. 似是而非的，欺骗性的： having a false look of truth or genuineness
【例】 a specious argument that really does not stand up under close examination 一段经不起仔细推敲的论证
【近】 beguiling, deceitful, deceiving, deluding, delusive, delusory, fallacious, false, misleading
【反】 aboveboard, forthright, straightforward 明确的

【记】 spec- 看，看着不错的；
【另】 inspect 检查，查看
